scripts.test: npm run test-jshint && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-jshint: node --harmony-generators node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint --reporter node_modules/jshint-stylish/stylish.js index.js test lib
scripts.test-cov: node --harmony-generators node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter spec test/*.js test/node/*.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run-script test-jshint && node --harmony-generators node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec test/*.js test/node/*.js
scripts.browser-test: node --harmony-generators node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd test/types.js test/sources.js test/lazy.js test/context.js test/binr.js test/browser/sources.js test/browser/binr.js > browserified_tests.js
